effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.
